creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: blooming plum branch; "Y" shape at base forms two main branches; two sets of calligraphy at L; top set has eight columns with two red chops-one rectangular at UR and one square at LL; second set has three columns of calligraphy with two red chops-one rectangular at UR and one square at LL; two stacked red chops at LRC
markings: six untranslated red chops: two with each set of calligraphy and two at LRC
title: Leaf from album "Three Friends of Winter"
